comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: J. P. Morgan's funeral was held on 14 April, 1913 and was covered in the NYT of the next day: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9F0CE7D8103CE633A... This photogrpah was almost certainly taken on 14 April, 1913.

comment._content: The street sweeper does not pause to note the great man's passing.
